mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chapter (nid, chapter_name, content, create_time, word_num, allow) VALUES (#{nid}, #{chapterName}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{wordNum}, #{allow})
INSERT INTO chapter (nid, chapter_name, draft, create_time, word_num, allow, is_draft) VALUES (#{nid}, #{chapterName}, #{draft}, #{createTime}, #{wordNum}, #{allow}, #{isDraft})
mapper.select: SELECT chapter.chapter_name, chapter.cid FROM chapter WHERE nid = #{nid} and allow = 1

SELECT chapter.chapter_name, chapter.content, chapter.create_time, chapter.word_num, novel.title, novel.nid, user.username, user.uid, label.label_name, label.lid FROM novel RIGHT JOIN chapter ON chapter.nid = novel.nid LEFT JOIN user ON novel.uid = user.uid LEFT JOIN label ON novel.lid = label.lid WHERE chapter.cid = #{cid}
select chapter_name, draft, cid from chapter where cid = #{cid}
select chapter_name, content, cid from chapter where cid = #{cid}
SELECT cid FROM chapter WHERE nid = #{nid} and allow = 1 ORDER BY cid ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT cid FROM chapter WHERE nid = #{nid} and allow = 1 ORDER BY cid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT cid, nid, chapter_name, content, create_time, word_num FROM chapter WHERE nid = #{nid} and allow = 0 ORDER BY cid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT cid, nid, chapter_name, content, create_time, word_num FROM chapter WHERE allow = 0 AND nid = #{nid};
select cid, chapter_name, create_time, word_num from chapter where nid = #{nid} and is_draft = 1
select cid, chapter_name, create_time, word_num from chapter where nid = #{nid} and allow = 1
select word_num from chapter where cid = #{cid}

update chapter set draft = #{draft} where cid = #{cid}
update chapter set content = #{content}, allow = 1 where cid = #{cid}
